section.title: Add the Block Storage Service agent for the Metering service

step.para: To retrieve volume samples, you must configure Block Storage to send notifications to the bus. Before you restart the service, edit the cinder.conf file and change the notification_driver option to cinder.openstack.common.notifier.rabbit_notifier and the control_exchange option to cinder.
